data.title: Fredrick A Lennon (1905-1998)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Fred Lennon born 1905 Providence, Rhode Island, United States died 1998 Cuyahoga, Ohio, United States including parents + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
[children unknown]

Profile last modified 12 Jul 2021 | Created 9 Mar 2020

This page has been accessed 638 times.

Biography

Fred Lennon is Notable.

Fred A. Lennon (November 26, 1905 – July 23, 1998) was an American manufacturer and philanthropist. He was the founder and chairman of Swagelok Company.

Known for avoiding attention, Forbes magazine once described him as "the shiest billionaire".

Fredrick A (Fred) Lennon was born 26 Nov 1905 in Providence, Rhode Island, United States. He was the son of Patrick Lennon and Catherine Toner.[1][2][3][4]

On 1 Jul 1933 Fred married Alice C Phillips in Cuyahoga, Ohio, United States.[5][6]

He died 23 Jul 1998 in Cuyahoga, Ohio, United States.[7][8][9]
